MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault.  We are sorry we can't give you a time of restoration at present.  If you wish to call back later we will be able to give you more information.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a fault with the power in the WA7 postcode area of Runcorn, affecting properties in Leyton Close, Woodford Close and surrounding streets. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.57PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.13PM on 17th January 2021.
